summary: Tested BoardHeader component rollout to TextbookOrdersAdminTab, PreSaleImportTab, and MessagesTab. All 3 new tabs now use BoardHeader correctly with Monday.com-inspired design. Also verified previously working tabs (PrivateCatalogTab, StockOrdersTab, StudentsTab, PublicCatalogTab) remain functional. Mobile responsiveness tested at 375px viewport.
passed_tests: Admin login at /admin/login with admin@chipi.co / admin
Navigation to Unatienda via sidebar
TextbookOrdersAdminTab: BoardHeader renders with title 'Textbook Orders' and Package icon
TextbookOrdersAdminTab: Tabs (Orders/Statistics/Reorders) render with data-testids board-tab-orders, board-tab-stats, board-tab-reorders
TextbookOrdersAdminTab: Tab switching works correctly - Statistics shows 'Total Orders', Reorders shows 'Pending Reorder Requests'
TextbookOrdersAdminTab: Search (board-search) present and functional
TextbookOrdersAdminTab: Status filter (txo-filter-status) dropdown present
TextbookOrdersAdminTab: Grade filter (txo-filter-grade) dropdown present
TextbookOrdersAdminTab: Show Archived toggle (toggle-archived-btn) present
TextbookOrdersAdminTab: Stats row (board-stats) showing 13 total, 1 reorders
TextbookOrdersAdminTab: Refresh button (board-refresh) present
TextbookOrdersAdminTab: Orders table renders with student data, status dropdowns, action buttons
PreSaleImportTab: BoardHeader renders with title 'Pre-Sale Import' and ShoppingCart icon
PreSaleImportTab: Search (board-search) present
PreSaleImportTab: Status filter (psi-status-filter) dropdown present
PreSaleImportTab: Stats row showing 0 total, 0 linked
PreSaleImportTab: Preview Import button (preview-import-btn) present in header
PreSaleImportTab: Refresh button (board-refresh) present
PreSaleImportTab: Help card with import workflow instructions visible
MessagesTab: BoardHeader renders with title 'Messages' and MessageCircle icon
MessagesTab: Search (board-search) present
MessagesTab: Stats row showing 0 conversations
MessagesTab: Config/Settings toggle (messages-config-btn) present in header
MessagesTab: Refresh button (board-refresh) present
MessagesTab: Conversation list renders (empty state shown correctly)
PrivateCatalogTab (Inventory): BoardHeader still working with title 'Inventory'
StockOrdersTab (Stock Mov.): BoardHeader still working with title 'Stock Movements'
StudentsTab (Students): BoardHeader still working with title 'Estudiantes'
PublicCatalogTab (Public Store): BoardHeader now present with title 'Public Catalog'
Mobile (375px): TextbookOrdersAdminTab BoardHeader renders correctly
Mobile (375px): Filter toggle (board-filter-toggle) visible on TextbookOrdersAdminTab
Mobile (375px): PreSaleImportTab BoardHeader renders correctly with filter toggle
Mobile (375px): MessagesTab BoardHeader renders correctly (no filter toggle as expected - no filters prop)
critical_code_review_comments: TextbookOrdersAdminTab correctly implements BoardHeader with tabs, filters, stats, and actions
PreSaleImportTab correctly implements BoardHeader with search, status filter, stats, and Preview Import action
MessagesTab correctly implements BoardHeader with search, stats, and settings toggle (no filters needed)
All data-testid attributes properly applied across new tabs
Mobile responsiveness working correctly - filter toggles visible on mobile for tabs with filters
PublicCatalogTab now has BoardHeader (improved from iteration_149 which noted it didn't)
Console warning: 'Each child in a list should have a unique key prop' in PublicCatalogTab/TableBody - minor issue
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 7 Unatienda admin tabs now use BoardHeader component for consistent Monday.com-inspired design: PrivateCatalogTab (Inventory), PublicCatalogTab (Public Store), StockOrdersTab (Stock Mov.), TextbookOrdersAdminTab (Textbook Orders), PreSaleImportTab (Pre-Sale Import), MessagesTab (Messages), StudentsTab (Students). Mobile responsiveness works correctly with filter toggles appearing on mobile for tabs that have filters. Admin login: admin@chipi.co / admin. Navigate: sidebar > Unatienda.
